skills.name: Arc Lash
skills.desc: ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>14%</text></br>Unleash arcing lightning that deals <text class='c_number'>[0.42 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to enemies in front of you. Every <text class='c_number'>0.420</text> times <text class='c_important'>Arc Lash</text> swipes, it Stuns all enemies hit for <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds.

skills.name: Charged Bolts
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Mana Cost: </text><text class='c_resource'>[30 + (AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_012) ? [30 * (Affix_Value_1#legendary_sorc_012/100)] : 0)]</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Release <text class='c_number'>[5 + (AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_012) ? [Affix_Value_1#legendary_sorc_012 / 100] : 0)]</text> bolts of lightning that course along the ground in an erratic pattern, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage each.

skills.name: Ice Armor
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>20</text> seconds</br>A <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> of ice forms around you for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds, absorbing <text class='c_number'>[[(0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))) * (1+[Bonus_Ice_Armor_Shield_Percent])]*100]%</text> of your Base Life <text class='c_number'>([(0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))) * (1+[Bonus_Ice_Armor_Shield_Percent])])</text> in damage. While <text class='c_important'>Ice Armor</text> is active, <text class='c_number'>5%</text> of your damage dealt is added to its <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text>.

skills.name: Unstable Currents
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>70</text> seconds</br>Lightning surges within you for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds. Whenever you cast a <text class='c_important'>Shock</text> Skill, a random <text class='c_important'>Core</text>, <text class='c_important'>Conjuration</text>, or <text class='c_important'>Mastery</text> <text class='c_important'>Shock</text> Skill is also cast.

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.desc: if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? 0 : 1]<text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? 0.25 : [24 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>if[24 * (cdr[sLevel]]9<text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>2</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? [[24 * (cdr[sLevel]] * (1+[Affix_Value_1#legendary_sorc_017])] : 0</text> seconds</br>Unleash a torrent of frost, <text class='c_important'><u>Freezing</u></text> enemies around you for <text class='c_number'>[24 * (cdr[sLevel]]1</text> seconds.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>0 ? 0 : [11 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>[[11 * (cdr[sLevel]]4]%</text></br>Transform into lightning, becoming <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> and surging to the target location, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.25 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage around you upon arrival.

equipment.name: Choker
strikethrough_affixes: Your casts of <text class='c_important'>Charged Bolts</text> have a <text class='c_random'>19.12%</text> chance to be attracted to enemies and last <text class='c_number'>300%</text> longer.
added_affixes: Your casts of <text class='c_important'>Charged Bolts</text> have a <text class='c_random'>22.84%</text> chance to be attracted to enemies and last <text class='c_number'>300%</text> longer.

equipment.name: Band
added_affixes: Casting a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill reduces the Mana cost of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> or <text class='c_important'>Mastery</text> Skill by <text class='c_random'>22.84%</text>.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: Critical Strikes electrically charge the enemy for <text class='c_random'>1.64</text> seconds, causing lightning to arc between them and any other charged enemies dealing <text class='c_number'>0.32</text> Lightning damage.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
base_affixes: When there are at least <text class='c_number'>5</text> Close enemies, Stun them for <text class='c_random'>2.39</text> seconds. This can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>20</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Gauntlets
added_affixes: Distant enemies have a <text class='c_number'>9.6%</text> chance to be Stunned for <text class='c_number'>2.4</text> seconds when they hit you. You deal <text class='c_random'>21.4%</text> increased damage to Stunned enemies.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: When you are afflicted with a Crowd Control effect, there is a <text class='c_random'>38%</text> chance that the same enemy and enemies around you are also afflicted with the same effect for <text class='c_random'>1.5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Caged Heart
base_affixes: For each unique element you deal damage with, you deal <text class='c_random'>8.29%</text> increased damage for <text class='c_random'>2</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Jade Greatstaff
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>32.1%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Doom Cuisses
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>24%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>6.16</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Circle
added_affixes: Attacking enemies with a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast by <text class='c_random'>8.9%</text>, up to <text class='c_number'>30%</text>.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>33.08%</text> increased Movement Speed when moving away from Slowed or <text class='c_important'><u>Chilled</u></text> enemies.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>34.7%</text> Movement Speed for <text class='c_number'>3.6</text> seconds after <text class='c_important'>Teleporting</text>.
